item.title: Mentioned by durhamregion.com
item.description:
Hoping MP does a better job with immigrants
Hoping MP does a better job with immigrants. Ajax News Advertiser. To the editor: Re: 'Two Durham MPs named to federal cabinet', news, durhamregion.com, July 15, 2013. So, Chris Alexander has a promotion to immigration minister. No doubt he has the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Globe and Mail
item.description:
Chris Alexander has 'big shoes to fill' as Immigration Minister
A former diplomat with a mop of blonde hair, Chris Alexander is the poster boy for the “generational change” Stephen Harper heralded this week as he restocked his cabinet with new blood to convince Canadians to take a fresh look at a government in its eighth year of power. ... Telegenic and well spoken, the boyish-looking Ajax-Pickering MP has made a name for himself both inside and outside the Prime Minister's Office as a forceful spokesman for the Conservatives since taking his seat in 2011. He has been ...
